Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Class yii\grid\Column

All Classes | Properties | Methods
Inheritanceyii\grid\Column » yii\base\Object
Implementsyii\base\Arrayable
Subclassesyii\grid\ActionColumn, yii\grid\CheckboxColumn, yii\grid\DataColumn, yii\grid\SerialColumn
Available since version2.0
Source Code
Column is the base class of all yii\grid\GridView column classes.

Hide inherited properties

$footerOptions yii\grid\Column

Property Details

$grid property
yii\grid\GridView $grid = null

The grid view object that owns this column.

$header property
string $header = null

The header cell content. Note that it will not be HTML-encoded.

$footer property
string $footer = null

The footer cell content. Note that it will not be HTML-encoded.

$content property
callable $content = null

$visible property
boolean $visible = true

Whether this column is visible. Defaults to true.

$options property
$options = []

$headerOptions property
$headerOptions = []

$contentOptions property
array|\Closure $contentOptions = []

$footerOptions property
$footerOptions = []

$filterOptions property
array $filterOptions = []

The HTML attributes for the filter cell tag.

Method Details

renderHeaderCell() method
void renderHeaderCell( )

Renders the header cell.

renderFooterCell() method
void renderFooterCell( )

Renders the footer cell.

renderDataCell() method
string renderDataCell( $model, $key, $index )
$model mixed The data model being rendered
$key mixed The key associated with the data model
$index integer The zero-based index of the data item among the item array returned by \yii\grid\dataProvider.
return string the rendering result

Renders a data cell.

renderFilterCell() method
void renderFilterCell( )

Renders the filter cell.

renderHeaderCellContent() method
string renderHeaderCellContent( )
return string the rendering result

Renders the header cell content.

The default implementation simply renders $header. This method may be overridden to customize the rendering of the header cell.

renderFooterCellContent() method
string renderFooterCellContent( )
return string the rendering result

Renders the footer cell content.

The default implementation simply renders $footer. This method may be overridden to customize the rendering of the footer cell.

renderDataCellContent() method
string renderDataCellContent( $model, $key, $index )
$model mixed The data model
$key mixed The key associated with the data model
$index integer The zero-based index of the data model among the models array returned by \yii\grid\dataProvider.
return string the rendering result

Renders the data cell content.

renderFilterCellContent() method
string renderFilterCellContent( )
return string the rendering result

Renders the filter cell content.

The default implementation simply renders a space. This method may be overridden to customize the rendering of the filter cell (if any).
